name: Weather App
description: A weather forecasting web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fetches real-time weather data using an API.

name: Smart Calculator
description: An advanced calculator with arithmetic operations, trigonometric functions, dark mode, and error handling.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe game with a responsive UI and player vs. player mode.

name: Coming Soon
description: New exciting projects are on the way. Stay tuned!
